about_the_game:
A gripping Roguelite adventure that blends heart-pounding action with innovative echolocation mechanics.

As the Shogun's greatest assassin, you find yourself betrayed and your eyes stolen by a demon. Now blinded, armed with nothing but your skills and cold-blooded rage, you rush towards the Shogun to warn him of the danger in his castle.

.

Master Echolocation!

Every move you make is shrouded in darkness, and only through the power of sound can you illuminate your path. Emit pulses of sound to reveal the environment around you, uncover hidden traps, and detect the presence of lurking adversaries. Upgrade your senses as you play to unlock new abilities and hear new sounds to help you in battle!

.

Fight bosses in total darkness!

Face off against challenging bosses and hordes of foes that will test your senses to their limits! Each is more cunning and ruthless than the last in your climb to the top of the Shogun's castle.

.

Expand your Weapon Arsenal!

Master a multitude of weapons at your disposal! Just remember the heavier they are the louder they hit!

.

Make pacts with Demons!

As you delve deeper into the heart of darkness, uncover the truth behind your betrayal and confront demons who offer great power through their pacts. Offering supernatural abilities, weapon skills and secret moves! Use them at your own risk and bring carnage to every enemy in your way!

.

Create your own story!

Interact with the residents of the Shoguns castle, both human and demonic, and pick your allies and pave the way for your own ending. The story is just as dynamic as the gameplay and your choices will affect both the world and the characters.

.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 360
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i5 Skylake or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 or AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: A Roguelite RPG about betrayal, revenge, and how much you’re willing to pay to get it. Use echolocation to fight your enemies, make pacts with demons to grow stronger, gather weapons, find the one who stole your eyes and make them pay!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
